thread.title: BRIEF-ZUK Elzab to transfer its stake in Micra Metripond KFT to Comp Centrum Innowacji
thread.title_full: BRIEF-ZUK Elzab to transfer its stake in Micra Metripond KFT to Comp Centrum Innowacji

title: BRIEF-ZUK Elzab to transfer its stake in Micra Metripond KFT to Comp Centrum Innowacji
text:
BRIEF-ZUK Elzab to transfer its stake in Micra Metripond KFT to Comp Centrum Innowacji Sept 2 
Sept 2 Zaklady Urzadzen Komputerowych Elzab SA : 
* Said on Tuesday it signed an agreement for transfer of its entire 92.17 percent stake in Micra Metripond KFT, based in Hungary, to Comp Centrum Innowacji Sp. z o.o. 
* The price of the transaction is 6.5 million zlotys ($1.7 million) 
* Additionally, it raised its stake in Com Centrum Innowacji, to 49.7 percent from 46.7 percent, via participation in its capital increase 
Source text for Eikon: 
($1 = 3.7664 zlotys) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
